name: Count users per G Suite organizational unit
description: This template shows how you can set Make to list all your G Suite organizational units and count their number of users. Then, the result is saved in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1H7S6BPYc5DH3KTx841t2SFJsaLqlgj9MclYoS0szwDc/edit#gid=0).
